sources.title: Just Ask Jupiter (1938)
sources.description: A dog wonders what it would be like to be a cat, and imagines he goes to heaven to ask Jupiter to grant that wish. He finds nothing but hatred and violence in his feline mode. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/just-ask-jupiter-1938/

metadata.Plot: A dog wonders what it would be like to be a cat, and imagines he goes to heaven to ask Jupiter to grant that wish. He finds nothing but hatred and violence in his feline mode.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
